meanings.definition: Having a smug or conceited smile
meanings.sent1: She wore the smirkiest expression after winning the game.
meanings.sent2: He always had the smirkiest look on his face when he thought he was right.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave me the smirkiest look as if it knew a secret.
meanings.sent4: Her smirkiest grin was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The smirkiest smile on his face made him seem untouchable.

meanings.definition: Showing a sly or mocking grin
meanings.sent1: The student gave the smirkiest response to the teacher's question.
meanings.sent2: She had the smirkiest smirk when she teased her brother.
meanings.sent3: His smirkiest grin made everyone wonder what mischief he was up to.
meanings.sent4: The smirkiest expression on her face hinted at her mischievous nature.
meanings.sent5: With the smirkiest smile, he revealed his playful side.
